casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donald John SCANLON. No. 480A99-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 27, 2004. Janet Moore, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Scanlon. James E. Hardin, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of April 2004 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to File State's Response:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 26th day of May 2004 to file his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of April 2004."
